tool_description: Matches transaction entities against various blacklists including fraudulent accounts, blocked merchants, and suspicious locations.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier to check against blacklists

merchant_id.description: Merchant identifier to check against blacklists

ip_address.description: Transaction IP address for blacklist checking

phone.description: Customer phone number for blacklist checking

check_types.description: Types of blacklists to check against

error_messages: Invalid check types: Use combinations of [customer, merchant, card, ip, email, phone, location]
Missing required identifiers: At least customer_id and merchant_id must be provided
Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address format
Invalid phone format: Use international phone number format
usage: Provide customer_id, merchant_id, and check_types array. Include optional identifiers (card_number, ip_address, email, phone) for comprehensive blacklist matching.

matches_found.description: Whether any blacklist matches were found

matched_lists.description: Names of blacklists that had matches

match_details.description: Details of what entities matched which lists

risk_level.description: Risk level based on blacklist matches (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, CRITICAL)

recommended_action.description: Recommended action based on blacklist matches
